Package be.kdg.processor.statistic.services

Class StatisticService

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.kdg.processor.statistic.services.StatisticService
  • @Service
@Transactional
public class StatisticService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for the statistic package. Manages Statistics for the Processor.
    Author:
    Cédric Goffin

        @Autowired
public StatisticService​(StatisticRepo statisticRepo)
        Constructor used by Spring framework to initialize the service as a bean
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getStatistic

        public java.util.Optional<Statistic> getStatistic​(java.lang.String statisticName)
        Gets information about a statistic.
        Parameters:
        statisticName - string with the unique name of the statistic
        Returns:
        an Optional Statistic. Will be empty when no statistic with the supplied name was found.

      • getIntStatistic

        public java.util.Optional<IntStatistic> getIntStatistic​(java.lang.String statisticName)
        Gets information about a statistic with an Integer value.
        Parameters:
        statisticName - string with the unique name of the statistic
        Returns:
        an Optional IntStatistic. Will be empty when no statistic with the supplied name was found.

      • getDateTimeStatistic

        public java.util.Optional<DateTimeStatistic> getDateTimeStatistic​(java.lang.String statisticName)
        Gets information about a statistic with an LocalDateTime value.
        Parameters:
        statisticName - string with the unique name of the statistic
        Returns:
        an Optional IntStatistic. Will be empty when no statistic with the supplied name was found.

      • getProcessorStatistics

        public ProcessorStatistics getProcessorStatistics()
        Gets a ProcessorStatistics object with the current statistics from the Processor.
        Returns:
        a ProcessorStatistics object with the current statistics from the repository

      • incrementIntStatistic

        public void incrementIntStatistic​(java.lang.String name,
                                  int value)
        Increments/saves an IntStatistic object from the repository.
        Parameters:
        name - of the IntStatistic to be incremented
        value - amount the IntStatistic needs to be incremented with

      • saveDateTimeStatistic

        public void saveDateTimeStatistic​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime value)
        Updates/saves a DateTimeStatistic object with a given value.
        Parameters:
        name - string with the name of the DateTimeStatistic
        value - new localDateTime value for the DateTimeStatistic object

      • saveStatistic

        public void saveStatistic​(Statistic statistic)
        Persists or updates a Statistic the to repository.
        Parameters:
        statistic - Statistic that need to be persisted or updated
